articles.author: Jennifer Korn
articles.title: Zuckerberg unveils Quest 3 as Meta tries to stay ahead in the mixed reality headset game - CNN
articles.description: Meta is moving forward in its efforts to dominate the AR world with the new and improved Meta Quest 3. CEO Mark Zuckerberg unveiled the headset at Meta Connect Wednesday.
articles.content:
Meta is moving forward in its efforts to dominate the AR world with the new and improved Meta Quest 3.

articles.title: Right again, Einstein! Study shows how antimatter responds to gravity - NBC News
articles.description: In the world of “Star Trek,” the starship Enterprise zips through space using a warp drive that harnesses antimatter.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Crisis in Hogwarts ,Hogwarts! a school of magic
articles.description: Hogwarts, September 15, 2023: In a shocking turn of events, the infamous dark wizard Lord Voldemort, believed to have been vanquished years ago, orchestrated a daring assault on Hogwarts Castle..
articles.content: In a chilling resurrection, the sinister Lord Voldemort, his skeletal hand raised in defiance of time itself, spearheaded a nightmarish siege on the sacred grounds of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
